website_summaries.verdict: Similar to the Living Pure marks but offers better light-blocking qualities. The best value available.
pros: Comes with pouch and ear plugs
cons: Has the tendency to slip during sleep

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: After two years of regular use, the face sided lining is coming apart from the padded foam. Given the price I’m not overly surprised and yet still disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart within 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: The Sleep Mask is the 4th nighttime mask I've used over the past few years. When it came, the fit was a little bit loose around the head, but nothing too off. My bigger concern is that inside pads of the eye mask fell apart within 6 months of use. You get what you pay for, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Shan

customer_reviews.title: The sleep mask reinvented (from a dark sleep lover)
customer_reviews.text: I’m not someone who writes a lot of reviews, but I did feel compelled to give feedback on this purchase. I will never purchase another sleep mask. This is everything. Darkness, soft material, and the surprise- you can open your eyes without seeing any light. The way that it is shaped, the mask fits snugly around the outside of your eyes but is lifted in the middle, so you don’t feel any pressure on your eyelids. If you are someone that needs to sleep in darkness, like myself, this is the best purchase you will make. I plan to gift this to my favorite “dark sleepers” this year.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Simple product done exactly right
customer_reviews.text: I often get headaches caused by sensory processing sensitivity. This product is perfect for when my senses are overloaded and I need to take a little break. The contoured eye mask blocks out all light, and is so light weight it feels like you're not wearing anything. The earplugs are comfortable and effective. It's a simple product done exactly right. I'll be a continuing customer.
customer_reviews.author: Monica G. Bacian

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because I work night and need something so that the light does not keep me up during the day. This does the job! Velcro is nice that way I can customize it to fit what is most comfortable for me. I also like that the eye grooves are very deep so I don’t have to worry about putting unnecessary pressure on my eyes as some of the other masks I’ve tried had. Would recommend if you’re looking for a mask to help keep the light out
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_S

customer_reviews.title: great sleep mask for my chronic insomnia.. will use it every day
customer_reviews.text: Great sleep mask..... it helped me a lot.. seriously.. when i slept without it.. i woke up in 7 morning while sleeping only around 5 hours, with headache from lack of sleep and etc... with this thing i could sleep more in the morning! which i really need for my chornic insomnia.. it blocks the sun light in the morning and keeps you asleep.. really good thing.. i've also bought alaska bear sleep mask, but didn't like it much, because it pressures ur eyes.. this one is not..
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: too bad they can't get it right
customer_reviews.text: The first layer of material on the inside of the mask (the lining that is closest to your eyes) came apart from the other layers so now I have bunched up material that touches my eyelids that I have to carefully smooth down after putting on the mask. This happened within three weeks of owning it. Such a simple thing, too bad they can't get it right. For $13 it should be better made. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Moves around no matter how you adjust it.
customer_reviews.text: No matter how I adjust these they just don't seem to stay put. I got them after having lasik, so my ceiling fan wouldn't dry my eyes out. I can't tell you how many times I woke up to the edges of the mask pressing on my eyes. Losening, tightening and even trying to keep it in place on the back of my head with bobby pins didn't work. I also found the straps uncomfortably resting on my ears more than once after waking up in the middle of the night. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CKR

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart within a year.
customer_reviews.text: This item will not last more than a year. The seams are held together by glue, so every time you lightly wash or rinse, the integrity drops, but at least the band was actually sewn down... I don't see why they didn't sew the seams. Then there's the band. The velcro is dead center behind your head, so unless you're a side sleeper, you'll definitely feel it behind your head. As I mentioned before, this item won't last more than a year... The elasticity of the band will eventually slack and loosen to the point of breaking from the slightest pull. From top to bottom this sleepwear was made to break apart. This is definitely something I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JavaInMyCup

customer_reviews.title: Great for darkening, a little stiff around the edges.
customer_reviews.text: I use this mask to darken our bedroom and improve the quality of my sleep. At first I didn't care for the mask because I found the edges a bit stiff, but it is so good at keeping out the light! So, eventually what I did was to put a very soft light handkerchief under the mask. I find that the mask still fits and it is more comfortable for me. I think my sleep quality is improved but since sleep varies night to night I can't say yet. I do really appreciate that there can be a light on in the bedroom and with this mask on I have absolutely no awareness of it.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: No pressure on the eyes makes it so much more comfortable. Helps tremendously with sleeping in if you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Life changing sleep mask. No pressure on the eyes makes it so much more comfortable. Helps tremendously with sleeping in if you have trouble staying asleep once it gets light out. Or for midday naps.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: You will sleep great
customer_reviews.text: Well..... I've had trouble sleeping for more than 20 years I slept with a pillow on my head covering my eyes But my hot flashes nixed that so ........ I bought this eye mask ITS AMAZING BEST SLEEP EVER
customer_reviews.author: GENEVA JERNIGAN

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok..., though my cat adores it and would give it a 5...
customer_reviews.text: As one reviewer noted, a good feature is that you can open your eyes while wearing the mask, and the world is still dark...but a bad feature is that it fastens at the back of your head...as a back sleeper, this means I feel it where it fastens...plus it has its logo plastered all over what is otherwise a nicely designed item...so it’s a little mixed...at least for me...but as noted in my headline, my cat adores it...he grabs it every morning for a few minutes of play...that’s worth some extra credit...
customer_reviews.author: Joanne S.

customer_reviews.title: the listing should specify that is not eligible for return like most of the other masks
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the listing should specify that is not eligible for return like most of the other masks. That is a tip off that many people wanted to return the item, like 99% of the items are that are returnable The mast\k has a good concept in giving the eye room to move. How ever the forming has created a rim around the mask that is not comfortable. Since the eye cups are so rigid, when you sleep on your side the mask is pushed away from the eye and has to be readjusted thus causing one to wake up to do this function. I will join the other useless things I have purchased in the bottom draw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UNCOMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: The mask does the trick when it comes to keeping out light, but it is pretty uncomfortable. The texture of the fabric makes my face itch and it has some sharp seams. When I wake up, my eyes feel like they have something in them. I haven't really been using the mask because I get more sleep trying to sleep with daylight than I do wearing the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Loves2read

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product in August expecting it to last ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in August expecting it to last. For starters the strap was uncomfortable. I actually has to cut it because it was too big for my head and I'm a large fellow over 6 ft. So I find it kind awkward. Second it's rare that it stays on my face for the night. I resolved that by us trapping it as tightly as possible but occasionally I wake and it's gone. Another issue I have is the qaulity of this mask. It's alrdy peeling at the seems after only a few months use. I ordered another mask after this one from a competitor we'll see how that fairs
customer_reviews.author: Steven R

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: When I'm standing up this mask completely blocks out light. As soon as I lay down it is too rigid and does not conform to face shape, leaving large gaps for light to come through. When I slept with it on the strap slipped down and rubbed/scratched uncomfortably against my ears. If I made it any tighter it would have given me a headache. Works well as a blindfold, not so well as a sleep mask. Disclaimer: I received this mask at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonG

customer_reviews.title: YOU WON'T BE ABLE TO SLEEP!
customer_reviews.text: This sleep mask is not big enough to cover eyes completely and lets the light in. I have a small head and face and it still did not work. Cheaply made. When I tried to return it, it said no returns even though I ordered it through amazon and it did not state the "refund policy" like it usually does. I called amazon and of course they have not answered their phones for months because of coveid 19, although I'm not quite sure why they can't answer the phone since everyone is working from home and answering phones. Maybe they work in a call center but I'm not happy with not having customer service to talk with.
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Fine for Pin the Tail on the Donkey
customer_reviews.text: A sleep mask should block out all the light this product does not. Not all the comfortable either. Then again I've heard the same things said for my favorite mask that I got on Amazon over 3 years ago. In addition the Bedtime Bliss has to be washed by hand. The backing on the inside came loose after a washing. It's simply glued on. At least the Bucky could be washed in a machine with delicate items,
customer_reviews.author: Jon D. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tried
customer_reviews.text: It lasted 2 years before it started to fall apart, I feel like that is worth the $12.90 it costs. I'm about to order another to replace it. It's the most comfortable sleep mask I've used, and blocks out a good bit of the light (a little still gets in), but I have yet to use a mask that blocks 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Malka Adler

customer_reviews.title: Best we've found - by two shift-workers who have used a lot.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both work weird hours and use sleep masks during the day when we need to. Other masks are uncomfortable, fall apart, or just simply don't seem to be designed for a human being's face. These are different. The eyecups are generous enough for anyone's eyelashes to not get shoved back into your face, the material is the comfiest I could hope to have strapped to my head while trying to relax, and they seem to hold up relatively well. The addition of a pair of earplugs is a nice gesture, and the little carrying case is pretty cute too. These are the best ones we've found.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Thick velcro strap makes it impossible to sleep in
customer_reviews.text: The thick velcro strap on the back of the face mask makes this mask unbearably uncomfortable when using with head rest or sleeping on your back. The thick velcro strap digs into the back of your head in a small concentrated pressure spot and makes the mask unusable. Other masks without the velcro are far superior. Also when adjusting the velcro I had to set it to the absolute maximum and barely got a good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Barely useful
customer_reviews.text: As someone with an enormous head this thing is too loose no matter how much I tighten it. It is always falling off my face in the middle of the night. It doesn't sufficiently cover your eyes as there is a gap around the nose that gets worse with use. It covers your forehead more than necessary, it should really be called a forehead mask as it does a better job as that. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ikki

customer_reviews.title: Subpar mask
customer_reviews.text: This product is very subpar. First it allows light in on the bottom and around the edges. The quality is also flimsy. Feels as if the fabric will come off the undercoating. As there is no option to return this items it's literally money thrown in the garbage. Avoid this mask and find one of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: R&T

customer_reviews.title: Soft and perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first real sleeping mask. I have always been hesitant thinking that a mask won’t feel Comfortable or would get tangle in my head or neck. This is the perfect mask it stays in place and is so soft. Also it’s like your private black out curtains. It’s really awesome. I’m finally sleeping with out disturbance of my window and it’s bright light coming from the daylight. Also I’m excited to bring it on long plane rides!! ZzZzzzZ😴
customer_reviews.author: Thalita Fuschetto

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable but delaminates after a year or two
customer_reviews.text: I've loved this sleep mask since I bought it two years ago--very comfortable, soft, form-fitting, and blocks out all light. Wonderful. My only complaint is that it's not built for the long-run. Starting about a year ago the fabric began separating from the foam to the point where it's now not comfortable to wear anymore This is a common problem with these type of lightweight sleep masks. Due to light sensitivity, I've worn them for years. For my next mask I'm going to try to find a brand that is either stitched or heat-"welded" around the perimeter.
customer_reviews.author: R. Page

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -I can open my eyes with the mask on and don't feel pressure on my eyes/eye lids. -very comfortable Cons: -slips around while sleeping (to be fair, I don't strap it on tight enough, which leads me to the next...) -velcro on the strap isn't long enough for me to tighten as much as I need (do I have a little head?? Lol) -the area over the bridge of my nose lets in a little light (again, to be fair I am Asian and have a low bridge) Overall I love wearing this mask to bed because I am getting much better quality sleep. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this mask when I fly
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask when I fly. I have boughten 4 because I always end up losing mine somewhere in between traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ahlmann (Scott)

customer_reviews.title: Its ok...
customer_reviews.text: Initially I gave this mask 5 stars because it blocked out all the light... but, after wearing it now a few weeks and hand washing it... it no longer blocks out all the light. Light sneaks in under the nose area.. i should be able to wear a mask nightly and wash it for several months before the quality changes.. if you don't mind a bit of light peaking in then this mask will work for you.. me i like zero light
customer_reviews.author: RGRose

customer_reviews.title: The mask adjusts well to various lengths and is great at keeping light out
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd sleep mask I have purchased. The first has lasted several years, However I have had to glue the covering around the edge several times. The mask adjusts well to various lengths and is great at keeping light out. I like the contours around the eyes which soothes the eyes at night. I have washed it in a bag which softened it up and gave it a cooling sensation when wearing it. The new one is still very firm and not all that comfortable. I hope washing it by hand or in a laundry bag will give it the same soft effect. I hope the covering doesn't come apart on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Misstery

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sleep mask over six months ago and wouldn't trade it for anything. It's so comfy with the contouring and I sleep so much better. You don't realize how sensitive you are to the tiniest of lights while you sleep, plus not seeing anything when you do wake up, the mask keeps you from looking around the room or looking at the clock. I did wash it on a whim a couple of months ago in cool water and the super thin inside layer of fabric started coming loose so I'll be ordering another one soon but it still works fine, just no silky lining anymore.
customer_reviews.author: R. Duron

customer_reviews.title: Almost feels like it’s not even there
customer_reviews.text: I usually put this on when I take naps in my car during breaks at work. I really like how the mask has a convex shape so there’s no actual contact with your eyes making the comfort all the more better. Doesn’t take too much effort to get a good fit so you don’t have to worry about small bits of light passing through any possible gaps. The earplugs are a nice touch. Absolutely no problems with this product. Highly recommended for any sleeping scenario.
customer_reviews.author: HandsON

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and a bit scratchy
customer_reviews.text: I had this brand before and liked it, but this one is not comfortable. The bridge area is more rigid and it makes it harder to breathe through my nose. It’s also a bit scratchy around the edges. I tried to return it and it’s not eligible for a return even though I just received it two days ago. I won’t go with this brand again. Update: I’ve tried to get use to this mask and I just don’t like it. The bridge it too rigid and it’s very uncomfortable. I’m sorry that I bought this one. Why is my negative review hidden due to a sensitivity sensor?
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Love the item, but you can't wash it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this sleep mask. Light, breathable, comfy, can open my eyes behind it and feel like I'm in the dark. But you can'e wash it. After about a month's of use, I decided to give it a wash because I started breaking out around the mask from my skin oils building up. So I put it in a mesh bag and washed it on gentle. The result was a clean mask, but the fleece on the inside started to separate from the mask. It still works and feels great, but I'm pretty sure another was will doom it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ryan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: It fits so well that I feel "secure" at night. I don't know why I have a problem sleeping unless I have something covering my eyes. But the way that it sits, it doesn't actually sit on your eye lids, so your eyelashes aren't matted or even touching the eye covers. It contours to your nose almost perfectly! There is a little light that does come through at the base of the nose, but come on...I'm grasping at straws here to even find a negative.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Crawley

customer_reviews.title: Not usable. Left black ink on my white sheets
customer_reviews.text: This is comfortable and keeps the light out. But the black ink bled on my white sheets!! After about a week's use it flattened out and no longer contoured over the eyes. This product is unusable
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: These work pretty well. However
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well. However, I have a rather long, angular nose. So, I do see a little light coming in from the bottom. Also, I turn a lot in my sleep. This requires a little adjustment during the night. Perhaps if there were two bands instead of one it might work better. Overall, I like them, but I'll be looking for something with a better fit in the future. Basically, it's comes down to the shape of your face. This almost works for me, but not quite.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Douglas Johnston

customer_reviews.title: I use this every night!
customer_reviews.text: I currently live in an apartment where the white blinds don't completely block out the light so I decided to give these a try. The contour part is one of the best selling points of this product and blocks out all of the light except for around my nose. Though I wouldn't worry about that since my nose is a wee bit flat and the bridge is small. The strap is made out of elastic and can be changed to fit your head, which is a nice add-on! The ear plugs that come with it are amazing at blocking out the sound of passing cars on a busy road. This is one of the best purchases I've invested in!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: I like that the contours give my eyes space to blink, move, and 'breathe'. It doesn't block out all light; a fair bit escapes around the nose bridge, and there is a small but noticeable peripheral glow around the sides and bottom. The straps are elastic with velcro and will eventually stretch out too much to be of use, and if not put in place just so, can get hair snagged (I have long, curly hair). At night, when the lights are turned off and I all I have to contend with are the city street lamps, the mask works great. During the day these are only effective when I have pulled heavy light-blocking curtains over all the windows.
customer_reviews.author: Kamikan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mask and ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister. She absolutely could not sleep with noise and lights (think hospital--family member ill). So I relieved her but still she could not sleep. This works, and she found it comfortable, finally got some rest. The mask and ear plugs are very comfortable. This would work well for a long flight if you want to "turn off the lights" and reduce the noise so you can sleep. Or pretend to sleep so the annoying person next to you talks to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Great product, only one drawback.  I'd still buy again and again.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable mask and I really like how the eye covers are cupped so your eyes or eye lashes don't rub up against the material. The only complaint I have is in regards to the breathability of the mask. After sleeping in it for four or five hours, I notice my eyes are damp with sweat. However, it's not that big of a deal otherwise. I'd recommend for any of you day-sleepers who need a mask to assist with light blocking.
customer_reviews.author: Brenton Lange

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: This mask is great, until you have to wash it. There are layers of material covering a memory foam core in this product, and the outer layers are only held on by adhesive of some kind that can be easily washed away. My mask has come apart. If you're extra careful with how you wash it, perhaps it could last longer... but for someone whose face gets oily overnight, this mask will not last through the cleaning needed to prevent itching.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Best Sleepmask around!
customer_reviews.text: This sleep mask is pretty awesome! It doesn't push against your eyes at all and blocks out all the light in the room. It fits so well over my nose too. You don't even notice you're wearing anything on your face. Love when I wake up, and I don't have to worry about it leaving wrinkles on my face. I've worn and used sleep masks for years. I'm the type that can't have any ambient light or I won't sleep at all. So I've been through quite a few. The best sleep mask I've ever used! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious. Smooth. Soft. Dark. Cupped so nothing touches my eyes. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I put them on, emitted a peaceful "ahhhhhh", and fell blissfully asleep. Dark. The most comfortable I've ever worn. The eye coverings are cupped so nothing touches my eyes... and honestly, that is so nice. Not required but so, so nice. It feels more like sleeping in a dark room instead of sleeping while blindfolded. I'm hooked on that. And the material is soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Vallery

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I was a little iffy as first due the shape and design but I was happily proven wrong. They come with their own traveling pouch and are super easy to bend And still bounce back. I brought these to My friends house and she has a lot of natural light and I wake up instantly. These let me actually sleep and not get woken up.
customer_reviews.author: Jen A

customer_reviews.title: Great product and outstanding customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad to let you know that even though the merchandise arrived late (I was sure that it was lost) I'm very happy that I finally got it. The product came complete and in excellent condition. It's very soft and comfortable to use. Highly recommended. Thank you so much for all your help and concern during this process and for all your effort in giving a quality customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ivelisse Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart really easily
customer_reviews.text: I am a heavy sleeper. Once I fall asleep I don't move. So when this thing started "peeling" the first week I had it I was pretty upset. I don't flop around and I haven't washed it. But the fabric is separating and it's annoying. Do not buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyyou

customer_reviews.title: Good blinders that could be better
customer_reviews.text: The good : Well made and delivred on time. Material is of high quality.the band is strong and adjustable via Velcro. The bad : mildly rough material that. May irritate the face. . The Velcro scratches. Suggestions to impoverished : use softer materials where touching the face. 'The strap could be redesigned to minimize velour touchin skin.
customer_reviews.author: Texas_Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is a flimsy and ineffective sleep mask. And because NOT RETURNABLE, a complete waste of money. If you are really wanting a sleep mask that works, spend more money from a company that stands behind their product!! The fit is very loose - leaving a flap of velcro at the back of my head for a snug fit. And it doesn't stay fitted around your head during sleep because it is so flimsy. And as another reviewer mentioned, there is a light gap around the nose. Made in Sri Lanka. Really terrible. I am going to spend for the Tempurpedic one now.
customer_reviews.author: Norah E. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it does not actually touch your eyelids. it is very breathable while still blocking out most of the light. I haven't used the ear plugs. (maybe it is my paranoia but I do not like to NOT be able to hear when sleeping. I want unusual sounds to be able to wake me up. But I have worn them in the past when the neighbors leave talk radio running all night long (you never really sleep if you are hearing conversations)
customer_reviews.author: P. Moran

customer_reviews.title: It seems like maybe these need a better stitching or sealant to ...
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, has an adjustable velcro strap, and keeps out the light. The only problem with this mask is that the lining peeled off at the edges within a week of use. It still functions but longevity wise, you get what you pay for. I have two of these, one for me and one for my boyfriend, and they both did this. I sewed the lining back in place on one and it still functions. It seems like maybe these need a better stitching or sealant to keep them together. If you need something cheap and don't mind fixing them after you buy them, then this works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not Same Product!!
customer_reviews.text: The item I received is not the one pictured. I bought the pictured item about 4 years ago and absolutely loved it, so thought I would purchase the same one again. Unfortunately, the quality is not the same and even the logo is different. It did not come in a plastic wrapping and is obviously used. Also, it is not eligible as a return. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sam18

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this mask has formed cups for the eyes so that my eyelashes are smashed when I sleep. It's nearly very comfortable. My only issue is that there is a velcro strap on the back which can sometimes get caught in the hair and the weight of the strap puts pressure on the tops of my ears. The ear issue will sometimes wake me up with soreness. While we have not achieved perfection yet, this is a pretty good mask.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: very uncomfortable for back sleepers or high cheekbones
customer_reviews.text: they have the right idea - the contoured eye part is legit. However the rest of the mask is really freaking uncomfortable.... its not super soft at all, so it doesnt mold to your face well. I have high cheekbones and it totally pushed the position too high on my face. If you are a back sleeper then forget it because the velcro thing closes at the very back so there is a thick, uncomfortable strip of velcro pushing into your head as you try to sleep returning for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: Finally found one that works
customer_reviews.text: I have had a sleep mask forever that comfortably sits off of the eyelids and still completely blocks light. I wanted a second one before a long trip and could not find the same model. I tried others and had to return a few other models because the eye indentations simply were not large enough or they weren't comfortable against the nose. This one I kept. It blocks light and still allows me to open my eyes under the mask, which is an important part of the comfort of a sleep mask for me.
customer_reviews.author: JoannaJ

customer_reviews.title: Great blocking
customer_reviews.text: This product really helped block out the lights and helped me get a better quality sleep. I gave it four stars though because the Velcro on the back was slightly uncomfortable, and it did take a minute to get used to a mask that did not touch my eyes. I’m not really sure I like the fact that it didn’t touch my eyes, but If you’re looking for that, then this mask is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe’

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I want to rate this product higher. I really do. It has a lot of good things going for it. It's soft, comfortable, and doesn't put any pressure on my eyes. I can sleep without realizing it's on my face. It blocks out most* light. The only problem is it lets in light through the sides of my nose. This may be because of my hooked nose shape. Blocking most light is better than nothing, but as soon as it begins to fall apart I will look into other options that may be better suited to my face.
customer_reviews.author: cmcm

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep mask, and I've tried a few. This one's best ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second sleep mask I've used, and I like my previous one too, but this is much better. Now I will say this - if you have a large nose with a high bridge, like I do, then a tiny tiny bit of light could get in around your bridge, only if you adjust it a bit off. That said, if you are normal beak sized, this thing is great. It's super comfortable, it's super dark, and my favorite thing about it? It actually has a sculpted form so that there isn't anything pressing on your eyelids. If you haven't tried a sleep mask, I highly recommend one, and this one in particular.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this. I need to sleep with a face mask and I thought I’d try this. It’s very stiff, cheaply made. I tried to return after opening, but it turns out you can’t. Don’t buy! Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I got this! I recently switched to night shift and had trouble staying asleep because the sun would shine through the window at about 7. It is very comfortable. I could barely see a sliver of light by my nose when I was trying to look for light, absolutely dark when eyes are closed though. The design leaves room around the eyes enough to blink and not feel it. I thought the elastic band would feel weird but I barely notice it. FYI, I toss and turn a lot when I sleep. This stays on the whole time. Look no further, you will be happy with this sleep mask.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second set of sleep mask and earplugs, after the first set wore out with nightly use over the last 3 years (the silky material started to separate away from the foam of the mask). Honestly, I've tried other earplugs (lots of earplugs) over the years and these are the best. Initially I bought these to try and nap in the afternoon before heading to night school, and was amazed at how well they worked! Now I have a dog and husband that snore, making earplugs essential. The mask blocks out enough light that I am able to sleep past 7 am on the weekends. I take my sleep stuff everywhere, in case hotels are noisy! Love.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for night shifters
customer_reviews.text: Night shifter here! I've been working 6p-6a for almost 4 years. I had to retire my eye mask due to the strap being very stretched out. This Eye mask is wonderful. It has an adjustable strap with velcro. The eye and nose area are contoured to fit snuggly around your nose and away from your eyes. You can open your eyes without touching the mask but it's completely dark. Definitely recommend for night shifters who need complete darkness during the day. My only con is it leaves indents around the bottom of my eyes, so I need to have it off long enough before I go to work, but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: I learned to love it.
customer_reviews.text: At first I really didn't like it. As a guy who works the overnight I had to find a way to get sleep during the day. I had used other types that were just straight across the eyes and were a little tight. This one is shaped to give you room around your eyes. After getting used to it and my wife giving me a hard time wearing my "bra for my eyes" lol it helped a lot. You never get used to sleeping during the day but this definitely helps. It's very very comfortable. I highly recommend this product. I will be buying another soon for a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Don S.

customer_reviews.title: Good shape, poor materials
customer_reviews.text: The contoured shape is awesome. The material is garbage. Lasted a month before it started coming undone on the edges. Glue kept it together about another week. The mask has the potential to be an excellent product, IF they run the edges a little longer and sew them instead of using glue. Would buy again if they made changes.
customer_reviews.author: Grimlet

customer_reviews.title: Next level of comfort, and darkness.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. super dark. But....the felt that covers the foam will soon come off. Still, I use mine without any issue, with the absence of the inside layer of fabric. There is no change in comfort. Just don't be afraid to pull it off if it happens to any of you. Overall, it is high quality, most notable with the form and the foam. I can no longer use any regular sleep mask, because this one takes it to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Gordon

customer_reviews.title: They Do the Job BUT
customer_reviews.text: I got this sleeping mask because my husband and I have a MASSIVE window near the ceiling of our bedroom that we haven't had the time to order custom shades for, thus our room is extremely bright. This sleeping mask is great in that it blocks out all the light in the room perfectly, however it comes off in my sleep and thus I find myself woken up by lights throughout the night. Now, this could just be user error, but figured I would let everyone know!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hull

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this same product three years ago, wore it out and liked it so much, ordered another. Good quality; the Velcro in the back can be suited for the tightness you would like and the contour nose guard does not let any light through. The eye mask is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Fabric separates from Foam.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mask for around 3 years and use about once a week. At first it was OK but the fabric has detached from the foam part of the mask so now the material is not attached to anything. It looks like the glue used did not work or it only stays attached for a certain amount of time. I would recommend that you shop elsewhere for a different mask.
customer_reviews.author: Kupuna

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy the design of the mask
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the design of the mask, with it going over my nose much easier than my previous mask. However I do not enjoy the material it is made of as much, as it isn't nearly as soft, but that isn't a deal breaker for me. The headband is a mixed bag for me, as I enjoy the ease of use of the Velcro style, but the Velcro occasionally does snag a hair sometimes, but I am okay with that. Overall, it's okay and there are definitely areas that can be improved upon.
customer_reviews.author: matt stalone

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant straps/light still leaks in.
customer_reviews.text: Awful mask. The straps caused significant pain and its made out of dreadful materials. Do not be fooled by the massive good ratings, I have a feeling they manipulated those, because honestly I can't understand how this product would ever get a decent review, unless all other sleep masks on earth had been destroyed. Even with its "innovative" design, it still wasn't efficient at keeping light from reaching your eyes by the bridge of the nose. Please avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hefling

customer_reviews.title: The best sleep mask I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mask for 4 years, and it still works perfectly. I have used many different sleep masks from airlines, hotels, and evens other ones I've bought, and this one is BY FAR the best. Highly recommend, especially for those who don't like when there is pressure on the eyes - these lift away from the eyes just enough to not bother.
customer_reviews.author: Allison L.

customer_reviews.title: Inner material frays after awhile
customer_reviews.text: This item isn't terrible. When you first start wearing it, it's actually very comfortable because it lays on your face in a way that isn't too disruptive while you're trying to sleep. After a few months the inner lining inside the eye mask did seem to tear away from the actual mask area. So 3 stars for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: True Value for Money...Great Mask!
customer_reviews.text: Have only used these a few nights now but they seem well made, are comfortable and keep things nice and dark! UPDATE: OK I've had these now for some weeks now. I am REALLY impressed. Other masks have not held up at all, this feels like the day I bought. It's still firm and is really well made. In addition, other masks had me waking up in the morning with sweaty forehead, and this mask never does that. It's totally dry...and my "room" is completely dark. Best mask out there!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic eye mask for travelers!
customer_reviews.text: I use these religiously when I travel, as it always seems that there are random lights in hotel rooms or shades that don't close well. This brand of eye mask is comfortable, as I can't stand having fabric pressed against my eyes. Only complaint is that the Velcro tab pulls my hair if I'm not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Light comes in around the nose
customer_reviews.text: It's a very fancy sleep mask, like a sculpted bra for your eyes. I like that it doesn't put pressure on my eyes, that's a nice feature. But it lets in light around the bottom of my nose. I do have a big head, so big that in high school my football helmet had to be special ordered. So maybe it's just me. But these don't block out all the light for me. I find myself unconsciously squinting to try to block out the light. I had much better luck with the Alaska Bear mask, so I'm ordering another one of today to replace the one I lost.
customer_reviews.author: Medium Rare

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: My husband plays computer games in our room at night. I needed something to block sounds and light. I've never used a sleep mask. I doesn't stay on all night, which is fine because he's usually in bed when it starts falling off. I can still hear things with the ear plugs in. I've not used ear plugs before either so I don't know if it's realistic to expect to hear no sounds. These also fell out during the night, but again that was fine for my needs. I'd like to try different ear plugs to see if there are better ones. The mask seems to meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Edges sharp on nose
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of different sleep masks and my difficulty with this one is that the part that goes around the nose is not soft enough and the edge digs into my nose. Perhaps I have an unusually shaped nose. But other masks I have tried do not have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Z

customer_reviews.title: Great eye mask
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye mask I have ever had. I can have my makeup on and it does not get messed up due the the raised eye pockets. No light is able to travel through the mask. I do not use the ear plugs due to having a white noise machine that is a life saver. I would recommend this eye mask over any other less expensive alternates. I have gone through at least 7 mask before finding this one. Usually the elastic part of the mask gets worn out and stretched out so it wouldn't fit. This has not occurred with the mask and the band is comfortable and do not feel it when I am wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: DanielleTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for like 2 weeks (like 95% black out maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for like 2 weeks (like 95% black out maybe 5% comes at the crease in the bottom of the nostrals and cheek...) then the inner fabric starts to come off and without the fabric it still works 95% but does not feel good at all. Also the elasic band stretchs out super easy and fast. quickly a tight fit becomes way to loose . Honestly my next pair (that i have to order now) i will be spending a little bit more and on a different brand. I just expected more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Graidey Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: An EXTREMELY comfortable eye mask, that I've been using almost nightly for six months now. Unfortunately, as other reviewers have stated, it's started to literally come apart at the seams. They don't use "high quality materials," and this doesn't last very long. I wouldn't mind if it were cheaper and advertised as such.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Let's too much light in
customer_reviews.text: Let's light in from around the nose, sides of the mask. Regardless of how tight or loose I have this mask, it let's in enough light that I would much rather keep my head under the blankets then use this mask. The mask also concaves on the eyes so when you blink it rubs against your eyelids despite the raised eye cups. Would not recommend. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Possum

customer_reviews.title: Rips out hair
customer_reviews.text: I work nights and need to block out sun light. This mask does block most of the light. I also love that it doesn’t smash your eyelashes. However, the Velcro always got caught in my hair. It would pull on my hair while sleeping and would always rip my hair out when I removed the mask. Ouch!!!! This mask is also falling apart after not much use. See photos. Because of the hair pulling I stopped using this mask.
customer_reviews.author: LionOSU

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The mask is decent, it does a good job blocking out light as long as you don't lay on the side of your face. The velcro on the back works but it catches my hair because the make it small enough for my hair the overlaps on parts of the band without velcro. If it were a sctretchy band or had a bit more velcro so it didn't pull my hair it'd have a full 5*. Recommend for anyone who wants a good mask, has short hair, or is a back sleeper!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit well enough to block the light
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit my face well enough to block light. Stiff and scratchy. I am not sending it back because I am using it to block the power light on my humidifier. It fits well enough on that, and I am back to using my Alaska silk sleep mask instead. P.S. Company is pushy with emails asking for reviews. Well, here you go, folks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: I have been using an eye mask of similar shape/style for some time now. The mask was on its last legs so I looked for a replacement and found this. The material is very thin - it's the first thing I noticed because that made it feel cheap. However, the mask does what it's supposed to do- it blocks out light and allows room for the eyes and nose without putting pressure on those areas. I use a mask nearly every night so I hope this one lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: DB81

customer_reviews.title: Decent Purchase for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The price point is not bad for these. This is my first sleep mask and this mask does not completely block all the light. You have to slide the mask down to block out light. The strap that holds on feels odd for me and I only use on rare occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Blake E.

customer_reviews.title: HOME RUN!
customer_reviews.text: This sleep mask is my third and final attempt at trying to find a sleep mask that does not leak light. I am a day sleeper and so simulating night time conditions is very important for restful sleep. For me, there is absolutely no leakage of light. There is no light leakage around the bridge of the nose, not around the sides, not even along the bottom of the mask. Nowhere does light leak through. And, the mask is extremely comfortable. I have found the answer to my sleep mask light leakage problem. Thank you Bedtime Bliss!
customer_reviews.author: waynobgood

customer_reviews.title: Found my match!
customer_reviews.text: Best eye mask I've ever owned. This is probably the 5th style I tried and I've found my match. 2 YEAR UPDATE: This mask has served me well for nightly use for over 2 years. Dropping one star as I update this review because despite the actual cover still holding up nicely after nightly use for this long, the strap has unfortunately lost its elasticity. I wish they would make the straps more durable so I wouldn't have to throw away an otherwise functional mask. I've bought these as gifts as well and everyone loves them, if they could figure out a way to either make the straps more durable or easily replaceable, I would be a lifetime customer.
customer_reviews.author: Anahita J

customer_reviews.title: Block out the world and get some sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Best. Thing. Ever. The mask is comfortable and blocks out light effectively. The ear plugs are nothing special (similar to what you’d find anywhere) but they get the job done. Using both the mask and plugs helps me sleep in even if everyone else in the house is awake.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: This mask fits well on my face, and blocks almost all the light. The mask lasted for 2 years. Now the foam is separating. Not too bad! These molded masks may have a limited lifespan. With the "vapor cloud" around our bodies, you might expect the sweat and moisture to finally breakdown the adhesives.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Kropp

customer_reviews.title: Aaaahhhhh...some zzzzzzzz, finally!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of those for wife and daughter. One is being used to block out light, in otherwise a very bright room, to sleep during day time. The other one is being used at college dorm room-sharing situation where one person needs to study and other needs to sleep. Both users tell me that Bedtime Bliss is a blessing. It is comfortable to wear and doesn't allow light to seep in. Due to its shape, it allows user to open eyes while wearing it. They both wish that the elastic strap/fastener was adjustable so they could tighten and loosen it as they prefer.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: This mask is great at keeping light out and allowing me to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse and I needed something more than blackout curtains. This mask is great at keeping light out and allowing me to get a good amount of sleep during the day even when the sun is shining bright. I'd say as time as gone by more light is getting in around the nose, probably due to wear and tear. Would definitely buy again once my current one no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: “Ahh... sensory deprivation...(approximately) 😴”
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s great! Thanks for the help w my sleep! Pros: -The recessed eye cups and good black out really help remove any pressure (distraction) on the eyes. -Overall, it has really helped me “blank out” both when laying down initially and when I have to get up and get back to sleep! (minor) Cons: -The Velcro in back started getting to me after a couple weeks (I’m an exclusive back sleeper). -You’ll need to wash it with water once a week—and maybe either mild soap or alcohol. (First time sleep mask user)
customer_reviews.author: JJ_in_Texas

customer_reviews.title: Good for 6 months, then you'll need a new one.
customer_reviews.text: After wearing this every night for the last 6 months, the material that is closest to your face has almost completely pulled away from the mask. If you don't mind something that won't hold up, buy this, but be prepared to buy another one after 6 months or so. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: krazeks1

customer_reviews.title: I got this excellent item in speedy time and have used it for ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this excellent item in speedy time and have used it for a few days now and like it a lot because it "really" does keep the sunlight out of my eyes, even when it's pouring in through the windows and the run is lit up. And, too, the concave areas for the eyes do in fact keep one's cornea from separating... . I'll likely soon be buying a couple of more of these lest the company suddenly go belly up....... So, take a chance and get 'em!! P.S. I like the earplugs, too, as they fit my small ear canals perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Soft.... but
customer_reviews.text: This mask is soft. It is not completely blackout. I could see through it slightly. The bad thing is that it kind of started to unravel at the seams almost the first night. Its not very well made. I ended up throwing it away. But hey, you live you learn.
customer_reviews.author: Heather chua

customer_reviews.title: Not for every face/head type - lets in light.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I have an unorthodox shaped head, but the way this mask fits me, it lets light in around some of the edges which defeats the purpose of a mask that its only job is to keep light out. After about a week, I gave up on it and passed it on to my daughter who plays with it now. So while it may work for most people, I suspect others will encounter the same issue of letting in light. Other than that, the material is soft, the velcro makes it easy to adjust and minus the light issue, it is comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Pitchy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and gives complete darkness even in a bright room
customer_reviews.text: I've bought one of these for my partner and another for myself and by far these are my favorite eye masks. I have a couple others at home that are more flat on the eyes rather than these ones that sort of cup around your eyes. The issue with flat ones is that you can still have light come through where it's not completely flat and these ones have no light coming through at all.
customer_reviews.author: Geek Out Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after three months of normal use!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. I have owned this mask for a mere three months, and the inside lining (the fabric that actually touches your eyes) is peeling away from the foam eye pads. This is not my doing. I have only used it for its intended purpose. For the relatively high price of this product, I expected it would last indefinitely. Seriously, how much wear and tear is a sleep mask subjected too? Please save your money. I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: DarkMandalorian

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: OMG the best sleep mask ever. Look no further! It keeps all signs of light out! I have laid down with heavy makeup on various occasions while using the mask and let me tell you that the way I adjust the mask IS a snug fit, but my makeup is never interrupted by it! The ear plugs are a real plus and I love the bag it brought for storage. I thought that the price was a little too high, but it is well worth it for someone who has gone through tons of stretched out masks and who even just a glint of of light bothers them VERY MUCH. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Lory

product_meta.title: Bedtime Bliss Luxury Sleeping Eye Mask for Men & Women. Our Sleep Masks are Adjustable, Contoured & Comfortable for Full Blackout - Includes Carry Pouch and Ear Plugs -  Black
feature_bullets: UPGRADE YOUR SLEEP WITH BEDTIME BLISS SLEEP MASK OR YOUR MONEY BACK - Our 100% blackout design is suitable for back, belly and side sleepers. With our 3D breathable design and free sleep ear plugs we guarantee you will get a better sleep if you are not totally satisfied we will refund you!

STRUGGLING WITH LIGHT POLLUTION OR NOISE POLLUTION? If so then our patented design Eye mask with earplugs for sleep combo is the set for you. Go to sleep at night with bedtime bliss in total darkness and forget about the noise.

DON'T LIKE IT WHEN EYE MASKS TOUCH YOUR EYES? - We have the solution, our sleep eye mask is lightweight , comfortable & enables rem sleep with room to open your eyes the 3D design means it wont touch your eyes , catch on your eye lashes or make your eyes puffy.

RELAX IN TOTAL DARKNESS- Soft and comfortable Ideal for Travel, Afternoon Naps or When Your Partner Watches T.V Late At Night Or Likes To Read Next To You In Bed use our sleeping ear plugs to block out noise for a blissful sleep.

SUITABLE FOR ALL FACE SHAPES OR YOUR MONEY BACK - The shape of the Bedtime bliss eye mask has been designed so it provides 100% black out to all face shapes and has an easy to use adjustable strap. It is suitable for men and women and children this sleeping eye mask is the business class of sleep upgrade today risk free with bedtime bliss or your money back!
